description:
Coloring Book has 62 beautiful drawings and 18 whiteboards:
● The Basic Chapter offers 12 drawings for free (the Jungle and Space themes). 36 drawings are available as Downloadable Content (Cats, Ocean, Farm, Girls Room, Construction Site and Dinosaurs themes)
● The ever-hungry hero of the famous Cut the Rope series is the newest addition: Om Nom Chapter offers 1 delicious drawing for free. Supernom and Nommies themes (12 drawings) + 1 bonus “Crazy Labo” drawing are available as Downloadable Content.
● The Whiteboard chapter offers you 1 empty canvas to unleash your creativity. 17 additional canvases are available as Downloadable Content.

No limits to your creativity:
● A palette of 130 colors for fantastic nuances
● 9 tools for advanced effects and convenience – a brush that always paints inside contours for example
● Use the touch screen or the buttons on the Joy-Con™ controller

Share your creations:
● Up to 4 players can color in the same time!
● Save your images and view them easily in your album

With its large range of options, Coloring Book is perfect for young and older children but can also be a great way to relax for adults.

New drawings might be available in future updates!
name: Coloring Book
